statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'M' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Other' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age < 25 OR age > 60 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT email, age, city FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_profiles.first_name, product_recommendations.recommendation_score FROM customer_profiles JOIN product_recommendations ON customer_profiles.id = product_recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender='Male' AND city='Los Angeles';
SELECT id, first_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY id;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score >= 0.8;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_orders FROM orders WHERE status='Delivered' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, product_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, email, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, timestamp FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_name, gender, product_name, category, timestamp FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-31' AND quantity >= 2;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pu.quantity > 5 ORDER BY p.price ASC;
SELECT r.product_id, COUNT(r.product_id) AS recommendations_count, AVG(r.score) AS average_score FROM recommendations r GROUP BY r.product_id HAVING COUNT(r.product_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'viewed';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_purchases > 3;

SELECT c.first_name, p.product_name, i.interaction_type FROM customer_profiles c JOIN purchases pur ON c.customer_id = pur.customer_id JOIN products p ON pur.product_id = p.product_id JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
